misc: Primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event.
biography: Toni, a distinguished member of Hirsala Golf, has been a pivotal figure in the Hector Trophée since its inception. Beyond his participation, Toni is the primary organizer behind the Hector Trophée event, ensuring its smooth operation and continued success.

A competitor in all eleven previous Hector Trophée tournaments, Toni's dedication to the event is unparalleled. He has secured the coveted Hector Trophée on three occasions, demonstrating his prowess in the pairs format. Furthermore, his individual skill has earned him the Victor Trophy twice, marking him as a formidable player in both individual and team settings.

Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Toni's strategic mind and unwavering focus make him a challenging opponent. Those who have played with him describe him as a gentleman on the course, always ready with a helpful word, albeit one delivered with the utmost seriousness. As he prepares for his twelfth appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, anticipation is high to see what Toni will bring to the competition this year.
